Uses of NoDataSourceException in niagara.query_engine
 

Methods in niagara.query_engine that throw NoDataSourceException
private  boolean QueryOptimizer.getStatisticsAndUrls(LogNode logicalPlan)
          This function walks a logical plan and contacts the data manager to get statistics and the list of URLs for the relevant DTDs.
 LogNode QueryOptimizer.optimize(LogNode unoptimizedPlan)
          This function optimizes an input logical plan and returns an optimized logical plan
private  boolean QueryOptimizer.updateDTDInfoWithURLs(LogNode logPlanRoot, DTDInfo dtdInfo)
          This function updates the list of URLs associated with each DTD, based on information received from the data manager
private  boolean QueryOptimizer.updateInfoWithURLs(DTDScan dtdScanOperator, DTDInfo dtdInfo)
          This function updates the list of URLs associated with the DTD, based on information received from the data manager
